summary.Diagnosis: Chronic Schizophrenia (Paranoid), Diabetes Mellitus - Hypertension (DM-HTN), Hypercholesterolemia (Triglycerides), Paranoid Delusions
summary.Treatment: Medications: Si ZODON Plus (1 tablet in morning, 1 tablet at night), Qubipin 200mg (1 tablet at night), ATIvan (Lorazepam) 2mg (1 tablet at night), Rivotril (Clonazepam) 0.5mg (1 tablet at night), SERTA 50mg (1 tablet at night). Continue other B.P. / Sugar etc. medicines.
summary.Follow-up: Call in between if any problem. In Emergency / If the doctor is not available, admit at Asha Hospital, Road No. 14, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad. Tel: 66752222, 23542838.
